workflow.name: Newsletter summarization & briefing with Gmail, AI, Google Sheets & Email
workflow.description:
Your inbox is overflowing with daily newsletters: Public Affairs, ESG, Legal, Finance, you name it.
You want to stay informed, but reading 10 emails every morning? Impossible.

What if you could get one single digest summarizing everything that matters, automatically?

‚ùå No more copy-pasting text into ChatGPT
‚ùå No more scrolling through endless email threads
‚úÖ Just one smart, structured daily briefing in your inbox



## Who Is This For

Public Affairs Teams: Stay ahead of political and regulatory updates‚Äîwithout drowning in emails.
Executives & Analysts: Get daily summaries of key insights from multiple newsletters.
Marketing, Legal, or ESG Departments: Repurpose this workflow for your own content sources.



## How It Works
 1. Gmail collects all newsletters from the day (based on sender or label).
 2. HTML noise and formatting are stripped automatically.
 3. Long texts are split into chunks and logged in Google Sheets.
 4. An AI Agent (Gemini or OpenAI) summarizes all content into one clean daily digest.
 5. The workflow structures the summary into an HTML email and sends it to your chosen recipients.



## Setup Guide
 ‚Ä¢ You‚Äôll need Gmail and Google Sheets credentials.
 ‚Ä¢ Add your own AI Model (e.g., Gemini or OpenAI) with an API key.
 ‚Ä¢ Adjust the prompt inside the ‚ÄúPublic Affairs Consultant‚Äù node to fit your topic (e.g., Legal, Finance, ESG, Marketing).
 ‚Ä¢ Customize the email subject and design inside the ‚ÄúStructure HTML-Mail‚Äù node.
 ‚Ä¢ Optional: Use Memory3 to let the AI learn your preferred tone and style over time.


## Cost & Runtime

Runs once per day.
Typical cost: ~$0.10‚Äì0.30 per run (depending on model and input length).
Average runtime: <2 minutes.

parameters.subject: ={{ "Newsletter Zusammenfassung von " + $now.toLocaleString("de-DE", { weekday: "long", day: "2-digit", month: "long", year: "numeric" }).replace(/^\w/, c => c.toUpperCase()) }}

parameters.content:
## Overview

**Step 1:** Collect: Fetch ~10 newsletters from Gmail and strip HTML noise.
**Step 2:** Organize: Chunk long texts (token-safe), log chunks + metadata to Google Sheets.
**Step 3:** Summarize & Send: An LLM creates a concise daily digest (key topics, implications, actions), builds an HTML email, and sends it to stakeholders.

**Note:** This template is not limited to Public Affairs. Swap the prompt and filters to use it for Legal, ESG, Finance, Marketing, Competitive Intel, etc.

## Group A ‚Äì Timing & Destination

**When & where**
‚Ä¢ Runs daily at the set time.
‚Ä¢ Creates/updates a Google Sheet to store raw text + metadata.

Customize: Interval/time; sheet name/tab.

## Inbox, Pre-Clean & Chunking 

**Collect & sanitize**
‚Ä¢ Pulls the 10 target newsletters via Gmail query.
‚Ä¢ Removes HTML clutter, trackers, inline styles ‚Üí clean plain text.

**Customize:** Gmail query (e.g., label:PA-News newer_than:1d), sender/subject filters.

**Token-safe structuring**
‚Ä¢ Splits long bodies into manageable chunks.
‚Ä¢ Maps fields (date, source, subject, chunk id, text).

**Customize:** Chunk size, field names, destination sheet/tab.

## LLM Policy Digest

**Create the daily brief**
‚Ä¢ Merges chunks into one digest with: Top topics, EU/DE relevance, risks/opportunities, action items.
‚Ä¢ Memory saves content when you want to analyze the newsletters over a longer period of time.

Customize: System prompt (tone, depth, output format), temperature/tokens, memory scope.

Reuse beyond PA: Change the prompt to Legal, ESG, Finance, Competitive Intel, Marketing, etc.

Build & Send Email 

**Deliver the digest**
‚Ä¢ Generates a clean HTML email (headline, TL;DR, bullets, sources).
‚Ä¢ Sends to the PA Director/team (add CC/BCC as needed).
Customize: Recipients, subject , branding.)

user.name: Jan Zaiser
user.bio: 3+ years of experience in AI & automation. Creating powerful n8n templates to save time, boost efficiency, and scale workflows.
